participant_1.name: Jessica Smith
participant_1.personality: Jessica is an enthusiastic individual who enjoys sharing her lifestyle choices and supporting others in making healthy decisions.
participant_1.background: I used to be a meat eater but I'm now a vegan. I aspire to be a millionaire. My favorite sport is hockey. I go to yoga. Watching sports is fun.

participant_2.name: Michael Johnson
participant_2.personality: Michael is a creative thinker who enjoys teaching and inspiring others. He has a passion for storytelling and solving puzzles.
participant_2.background: I am a teacher. My dad worked for Home Depot. I like to work puzzles. I love country music. I am an aspiring fiction writer.

content.text: Hi!
Hi there!
I'm a vegan.
Oh, that's cool! I've been thinking about going vegan myself.
It's a great decision! You'll feel better and you'll be doing your part to save the planet.
Thanks for the encouragement!
No problem! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to work puzzles, write fiction, and go to concerts.
Oh, I love puzzles too! I'm not so good at writing fiction, but I love reading it. And I love going to concerts, too.
That's great! We should go to a concert together sometime.
That sounds like a lot of fun!
Awesome! What kind of music do you like?
I like all kinds of music, but I'm especially a fan of country music.
Oh, I love country music too! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too!
So, what's your favorite country artist?
I love Luke Bryan!
Me too! He's so talented.
Yeah, he is.
What's your favorite song of his?
I can't pick just one! I love them all.
Me too! I'm glad we have something in common.
